about_the_game:
Welcome to Middle Ages Jigsaw Puzzles, where you can embark on a captivating journey through the medieval era. Immerse yourself in the rich history, majestic castles, heroic knights, and mystical landscapes as you piece together intricate puzzles that capture the essence of the Middle Ages.

In this engaging puzzle game, you'll be presented with a wide selection of stunning images that depict various aspects of the Middle Ages. From grand castles and fortified cities to knights in shining armor and scenes from medieval life, each puzzle is a window into this fascinating historical period.

Challenge yourself by selecting the difficulty level that suits your preferences, ranging from easy puzzles with a small number of pieces to more complex ones that will truly test your skills. As you progress, you'll unlock new images and unlock the secrets of the Middle Ages piece by piece.

Enjoy the therapeutic and satisfying experience of solving jigsaw puzzles as you meticulously arrange each piece into its rightful place. With smooth and intuitive controls, you can effortlessly rotate, drag, and drop the pieces, bringing the puzzle to life before your eyes.

Immerse yourself in the medieval atmosphere with the accompanying sound effects and music that transport you back in time. Feel the sense of accomplishment and joy as you complete each puzzle, revealing the beautifully crafted image in all its glory.

Middle Ages Jigsaw Puzzles is a game suitable for puzzle enthusiasts, history buffs, and anyone looking to unwind and immerse themselves in the wonders of the Middle Ages. It offers a relaxing and enjoyable experience, allowing you to escape the modern world and delve into a captivating realm of knights, castles, and legends.

Piece by piece, let the Middle Ages come alive in your hands. Discover the majesty and mystery of this remarkable era through the joy of jigsaw puzzles. Are you ready to embark on this medieval adventure? Let the journey begin!

- 5 difficulty settings: Up to 280 pieces!
- Every puzzle is unique: Different piece shapes every time!
- Saves all puzzles in progress, so you can work on several at the same time.
- 1080p HD Graphics.
- Support multiple screen sizes.

name: Middle Ages Jigsaw Puzzles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 330 MB available space
